full_summary:
# EV385-240286 CBSA North Portal Traveler Building Flooring Replacement
## Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency
#### Tender Number: WS4075682474

**Project Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites tenders for the North Portal Traveler Building Flooring Replacement at the Saskatchewan Port of Entry Travellers Building and Commercial Building.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work for this project includes replacing approximately 428 square meters of flooring with new carpet, porcelain floor tile, sheet flooring, and rubber base in a portion of the CBSA North Portal, Saskatchewan Port of Entry Travellers Building and Commercial Building.

**Key Requirements**

* Phasing and temporary furniture relocation to maintain full operations with minimal disruptions during flooring replacement
* The project must be completed in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Bid Closing**

The bid closing date and time is August 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Optional Site Visit**

An optional site visit is scheduled for July 27, 2023, at 12:00 PM CST. Interested bidders are required to attend and meet at the CBSA Port of Entry, located at HWY 39, North Portal, SK, S0C 1W0.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries, please contact Matthew Virakorn, Procurement Specialist at PWGSC:
Phone: Not available
Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

**Notice URL**

For further information, please visit the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16909044?extsite=MTY5MDkwNDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**NAICS Code**

30161700 - Flooring Installation, Refinishing, and Repair

**Trade Agreements**

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC,
